meanings.sent1: The puppy looked woefullest when it lost its favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: She wore the woefullest expression at the funeral.
meanings.sent3: Even the sunniest day couldn't chase away her woefullest mood.
meanings.sent4: The old, abandoned house had the woefullest appearance on the street.
meanings.sent5: His eyes held the woefullest gaze, reflecting his inner sadness.

meanings.definition: In a manner full of woe; sorrowfully.
meanings.sent1: She sang woefullest as she mourned the loss of her pet.
meanings.sent2: The wind howled woefullest through the empty streets.
meanings.sent3: The clown danced woefullest, trying to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The music played woefullest, echoing the sadness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The rain fell woefullest, matching his melancholy mood.
